nodes.text: "Han Solo" is the eleventh booklet the canon reference book series titled Star Wars Encyclopedia. It was  published on January 12, 2021 by De Agostini.

Han Solo was one of the most fascinating figures in the galaxy at the time of the Galactic Civil War. Raised on the streets of Corellia, he was a self-made man who had reinvented himself countless times, going from imperial cadet to smuggler, militant. as a soilders of the Empire and ending up as a general of the Rebellion and, years later, as a member of the Resistance.
